description: The Mediterranean basin is facing a new wave of heatwaves and large-scale wildfires. The affected countries have struggled to cope with the consequences of these extreme events.

Bodies found in the Seine: Two criminal investigations deepen the mystery
description: The four bodies discovered on Wednesday near the Pont de Choisy in a southeastern suburb of Paris had not all been submerged at the same time. Examinations revealed signs of violence on two of them, prompting the Créteil prosecutor's office to open two separate murder investigations.

headline: In France, accessible beaches help 'normalize vacations' for all
description: The 'Handiplage' label, awarded to 150 beaches across France, guarantees people with reduced mobility access to the water and amphibious wheelchairs for swimming.

headline: Haitham Karajay, chef: 'My mother cooked every day. I was lucky to have her by my side until she died'
description: 'Refugee Recipes' (6/6). Chef Haitham Karajay sought refuge in France to escape from the Syrian civil war. He quickly turned to cooking, with the support of the NGO Refugee Food, for which he now works.

headline: China's robotics industry surges amid promise of a $5 trillion market
description: From a global conference to robotic games inside the National Stadium, Beijing becomes the world capital of robots from August 8 to 17. The event showcases China's extraordinary acceleration in this sector – from automated industrial arms to AI-powered humanoids.

Once a rarity in France, temperatures above 40°C have become increasingly common with climate change
description: This threshold, which long remained unusual, has been surpassed much more frequently since the start of the 21st century. The affected area is also expanding further north.

headline: France faces sharp decline in priestly vocations
description: The number of priests has fallen from 65,000 in 1960 to around 12,000 today. While recruiting foreign priests and merging parishes have eased the decline, the Catholic Church in France continues to grapple with how to address the phenomenon.

headline: Trauma lingers in Greece, 10 years after austerity referendum
description: A decade after Greece rejected a third austerity package from its creditors, the economy has improved, but much of the population continues to struggle.
